inputSpec.name: nextflow_pipeline_params
inputSpec.label: Nextflow Pipeline Parameters
inputSpec.help: Additional pipeline parameters for Nextflow. Must be preceded with double dash characters (e.g. --foo, which can be accessed in the pipeline script using the params.foo identifier).

inputSpec.name: docker_creds
inputSpec.label: Docker Credentials
inputSpec.help: Docker credentials used to obtain private docker images.

inputSpec.name: debug
inputSpec.label: Debug Mode
inputSpec.help: Shows additional information in the job logs. If true, the execution log messages from Nextflow will also be included.

inputSpec.name: resume
inputSpec.label: Resume
inputSpec.help: Enables resume functionality in Nextflow pipelines. If true, will resume the previous session using the ID declared as resume_session.

inputSpec.name: resume_session
inputSpec.label: Resume Session
inputSpec.help: Unique ID of the previous session to be resumed. If not provided, will resume the last session run by an applet with the same name in the current project that runs during the last 6 months

inputSpec.name: preserve_cache
inputSpec.label: Preserve Cache
inputSpec.help: Enable storing pipeline cache and local working files to the current project. If true, local working files and cache files will be uploaded to the platform, so the current session could be resumed in the future
